body:
I am sorry for no shaders mod but my computer can not handle it. As soon as i can get another pc i will make a new one. Please subscribe if you like the video it took me about 3 hours to make. I will take constitutive criticism. But please i don't need hate at the moment. 

Watch it here-http://youtu.be/nc6ScsjCE-U

replies.body: I don't like the first 53 seconds because they just show you playing the game. I do like the parts where you quickly go over things, but there were too many of them. Also, you should put the official Avicus logo at the end.
